app.title: MiniApp Base
actions.resetDataConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all registered data on this device? This action cannot be undone.
nav.overlay.title: Navigation
language.dialog.title: Language settings
language.dialog.description: Choose the interface language. Changes apply immediately.
panel.welcomeMessage: Pick an option from the menu to start exploring your mini app.
panel.miniapps.item1.title: Welcome to Mini-app 1
panel.miniapps.item2.title: Welcome to Mini-app 2
onboarding.title: Getting started
onboarding.description.empty: There are no accounts on this device yet. Create the first one to access the dashboard.
onboarding.description.existing: Accounts already exist on this device. Sign in with your credentials or ask an administrator for access.
onboarding.step.register: Use "Create account" to register the first administrator.
onboarding.step.preferences: Set your preferred language and theme for the experience.
onboarding.step.explore: Open the mini-app catalog and try the available integrations.
onboarding.step.login: Choose "Sign in" and enter the email and password you received.
onboarding.step.support: Need help? Ask an administrator to create a new account from the user panel.
onboarding.tip: Tip: after creating the first account you can invite others from the user panel.
auth.login.title: Sign in
auth.login.switchUserSuccess: Previous session cleared. Enter the credentials for the new account.
auth.login.recoveryMessage: Enter your e-mail above and we'll send password reset instructions.
auth.register.title: Create account
auth.profile.title: Profile
auth.profile.panelMessage: Manage your account without leaving the main dashboard.
auth.profile.overviewDescription: Keep your information up to date for fast and secure access.
auth.profile.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {name}'s account? This action cannot be undone.
auth.profile.detailsDescription: Edit the information shared with your whole team.
auth.profile.securityDescription: Update your password regularly to keep this account protected.
auth.profile.quickActionsDescription: Sign out or remove this access from the device.
auth.profile.userManagementDescription: Invite dependents, update shared data, and transfer ownership when needed.
auth.profile.userPanelLoginRequired: Sign in to access your panel.
auth.profile.userTable.name: Name
auth.profile.userDeleteConfirm: Do you want to remove {name}'s user? This action cannot be undone.
auth.profile.transferConfirm: Do you want to transfer ownership to {name}? You will immediately lose owner access.
auth.profile.ownerDeleteBlocked: Transfer ownership before removing this user.
auth.profile.userForm.passwordHint: Set a temporary password and share it with the new user.
auth.profile.userForm.passwordOptional: Enter a new password to replace the current one.
auth.form.name: Name
auth.feedback.required: Please fill in all required fields.
auth.feedback.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
auth.feedback.ownerExists: This account already has an owner. Transfer ownership before assigning a new one.
auth.feedback.ownerRequired: An active owner is required for the account.
auth.feedback.ownerDeleteSelf: Transfer ownership before deleting your own account.
auth.feedback.dataReset: All data has been removed. Redirecting to the sign-in screen.

admin.dashboard.subtitle: Unified view to keep the shell healthy and predictable.
admin.dashboard.health.incidents.none: No incidents logged in the last 48 hours.
